Credits:
Author of the pictogram: Sergio Palao Origin: ARASAAC (http://arasaac.org) License: CC (BY-NC-SA) Ownership: Government of Aragon.
Verb-data - A collection of verbs and conjugations in JSON format for use in a mobile application. Origin: https://github.com/ian-hamlin/verb-data License: CC (BY-SA).
Balloon pop game - Pop Balloon is simple Android game. Origin: https://github.com/Vukan-Markovic/Pop_Balloon License: MIT License.
Image used for app logo. Origin: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Swings#/media/File:Myles_Tan_2016-04-16_(Unsplash).jpg"
Information: this app was created by Renzo Sampietro and is an AAC app designed to make communication boards for any use
